attributes.action: Not to value Council Tax as highly for people renting property as those who own them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems exceedingly unfair that people who are unable to afford to buy their own home, and have to rent, should pay the tax based on the value of a house that they do not in fact own. It is the owner who is generally making a good income from the home and who will be the eventual beneficiary when the house gets sold.
